level.heading: Limitation on contribution of bond proceeds and expenditure of funds.

level.text: The District's contribution of bond proceeds from public financing to the project budget, and the expenditure of funds, for the construction of the ballpark shall not exceed $300 million for the hard costs and $175,184,218 for the soft costs.
The expenditure limits of $300 million and $175,184,218 shall include public funds from any source expended by the District government or any of its independent agencies or instrumentalities.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 10-1601.05 and § 10-1601.33.
